## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code where necessary
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have added JSDoc/TSDoc comments where applicable

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] All new and existing tests pass locally
- [ ] Test coverage has not decreased

### Security

- [ ] I have not introduced any security vulnerabilities
- [ ] Sensitive data is not exposed in logs or responses
- [ ] Input validation is properly implemented

### Accessibility (for UI changes)

- [ ] UI changes are accessible (keyboard navigation, screen readers)
- [ ] Color contrast meets WCAG standards
- [ ] Focus states are visible

### Mobile (for mobile changes)

- [ ] Tested on iOS
- [ ] Tested on Android
- [ ] Works in different screen sizes
